issue.title: [CI][GLib] Log Homebrew output
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
We need more information to fix `brew update` problem.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3921?focusedCommentId=16706129) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
We don't need to work on this for now.
